content:
courtesy SRJC

Student Body President Delashay Carmona Benson announced the date of the winter semiformal and encouraged students to atttend upcoming events at Mondays Zoom meeting PERIOD

Cass Stewart EditorDecember  

Santa Rosa Junior Colleges student body president encouraged attendance at two upcoming student events and the Student Government Assemblys vice president of finance stepped down at Mondays SGA meeting PERIOD

Student Body President Delashay Carmona Benson encouraged students staff and faculty to attend the Is SRJC Ready for Me virtual panel Dec PERIOD  from  p.m PERIOD on Zoom PERIOD The panel will consist of  student representatives from various groups on campus including the Black Student Union the Queer Resource Center and the Second Chance Club PERIOD

According to Benson the students will discuss improvements SRJC can implement to make the college more studentready PERIOD

Lets make this an all inclusive campus for everyone where everyone fits in and feels at home Benson said PERIOD I think its probably one of the most important events that we have had hands down because its not even so much for us but for all the students after us. benson also announced the student life committee approved the Winter Soulstice semiformal dance for Dec PERIOD  from  p.m. inperson on the Petaluma campus PERIOD

It takes a lot to put these events together so I want to make sure that everybody is picking out their outfits their shoes and ready to roll Benson said PERIOD

Student Government Programs Coordinator Zack Miranda announced that Moses Legesse vacated the vice president of finance position and that SGA will appoint another student going forward PERIOD

Any student enrolled in  units with at least a . cumulative GPA can put themself forward for the position PERIOD Contact Zack Miranda for more information PERIOD

Health PEER and student assembly member of LGBTQIA2S Matti Cottrell invited students to attend this weeks WellBeing Wednesday from  p.m PERIOD on Zoom which will focus on communication and authentic listening skills PERIOD

See the latest SRJC BearFacts eNewsletter for more upcoming events PERIOD
